content: I'm glad you found the tips helpful! I've been thinking about my Instagram Stories strategy, and I want to try out some new ideas. One thing I've noticed is that my followers really engage with my stories when I ask them questions or ask for their opinions. I've also been using the Question Sticker and Polls to encourage more interaction. Do you have any suggestions on how I can use Instagram's features like Reels and IGTV to create more diverse content and attract new followers?
